Title: Ritual Artifacts
Description:
So many spirits held in captivity here... I can feel them everywhere. Even the walls are a cage for the long-dead.

$n, we cannot simply break the sorcery over this place - doing so would release countless agonized souls to wander the earth. They will need a beacon, something to guide them.

With your help, I can create a tan-chao: a bridge from this world to the heavens. For this ritual, I'll need a bowl, a candle, and a jade cong. You should be able to find them all within the ruins.
ObjectivesText: Bring Pei-Zhi a Chipped Ritual Bowl, a Pungent Ritual Candle, and a Jade Cong from the Terrace of Ten Thunders.
CompletionText: Have you found the items we need for the ritual? We cannot guide these spirits back without them.
RewardText: Good work. With these, I can complete the ritual to send all of the spirits here--including myself--back where they belong.
